task.description: Add status filter to Kanban Board

gaps.topic: Filter UI patterns for kanban boards
Task status relationship to Project states
Filter feature priority vs other Kanban features

task.description: Decision resolution: D1 - Algorithmic hex placement OK for Release 1?

resolution.chosen_option: Manual — builder places from day one
resolution.rationale: Algorithmic placement looks and feels bad. Manual placement doesn't add much overhead. Standard - Spatial Interaction Rules upheld from R1.

eliminated_work: #612 Patch: Standard - Spatial Interaction Rules override

task.description: Decision resolution: D2 - Jarvis UI — route or overlay?

resolution.chosen_option: Overlay — panel/drawer accessible from the map
resolution.rationale: Overlay for now. Route-based council chamber deferred.

task.description: Decision resolution: D3 - One project per hex?

resolution.chosen_option: One project per hex. Sanctuary is a 3-tile exception.
resolution.rationale: One per hex, simpler data model. Sanctuary gets special treatment as a multi-tile structure.

task.description: Decision resolution: D4 - What happens to category room agents?

resolution.rationale: Remove. Category agents are vestigial. Jarvis and Marvin handle everything.

task.description: Decision resolution: #636 - Design learning capture protocol for context assembly conversations

resolution.chosen_option: Option A — Triage step in Context Assembly protocol (Step 8.5: Library Feedback Triage)
resolution.rationale: Conan already does gap manifests and WHEN-section checks. Adding in-context triage after provenance logging captures library feedback at peak insight. No new agent, no new system.

new_work: Triage step in protocol.md handoff flow
eliminated_work: Option B: deferred batch review system
Option C: hybrid lightweight capture + periodic review
Option D: routing through Sam inquiry protocol

task.description: Decision resolution: #635 - Clarify context terminology: constellation vs. briefing vs. library

resolution.chosen_option: Option 2 — Rename for clarity: context library (source), context assembly (process), context briefing (output)
resolution.rationale: Drop constellation terminology entirely. Briefing is self-explanatory for both the assembly process and the output noun. Newcomers should guess meaning without a glossary.

task.description: Decision resolution: D5 - Campfire story structure — scripted vs improv

resolution.chosen_option: Designed posture sequence + free-form content within each posture
resolution.rationale: Grounded in MI (Engaging → Focusing → Evoking → Planning), Bordin Working Alliance exit criteria, Co-Active Designed Alliance, Stages of Change. Maps to Me → You → Us relational knowledge exchange per Principle - Agreement Over Expectation.

new_work: Prompt prototyping across builder personas (crisis, transition, growth, skeptical, terse, oversharer)
eliminated_work: Guided sequence UI (branching handled in prompt, not UI)

resolution.backfill_note: Backfilled 2026-02-19 via #644. Decided 2026-02-18. Downstream comments and blocker updates were applied manually on 2026-02-18. Propagation map reconstructed from prose.

task.description: Decision resolution: D6 - How does Jarvis assess crisis / transition / growth?

resolution.rationale: The reflection IS the scorecard. During Planning phase, Jarvis reflects back what he heard; builder confirms/corrects. 6-field campfire scorecard (startingState, heavyThing, firstProjectSeed, allianceAgreement, capacitySignals, valueSignals). Matches Agreement Over Expectation principle.
resolution.backfill_note: Backfilled 2026-02-19 via #644. Decided 2026-02-18. Downstream comments and blocker updates were applied manually on 2026-02-18.

task.description: Decision resolution: D7 - Where does builder context live?

resolution.chosen_option: Retired — not a valid DECIDE card
resolution.rationale: Technical architecture question (storage mechanism) belongs at MAKE, not DECIDE. Resolved using existing LiveStore patterns. Product question (what to persist) is upstream in D5.
resolution.backfill_note: Backfilled 2026-02-19 via #644. Informally closed/retired 2026-02-17. Not a real D-issue — technical architecture question reclassified to MAKE. Log entry records closure for provenance completeness.

task.description: Task resolution: #639 - Audit agent definitions against actual practice

resolution.rationale: George HEALTHY (9 logged resolutions, frontmatter gap fixed), Conan ADEQUATE (feedback triage step added, provenance bypass documented), Sam UNTESTED (deferred — zero activity to audit). Scope expanded from audit-only to audit + execute since fixes were small infrastructure edits.
resolution.note: Audit task, not a D-issue. #638 partially implemented by audit fixes (Steps 1-3 of its scope). #637 notified that Conan feedback triage is new context for its decision framing.

task.description: Decision resolution: D9 - PR gate applies to both factory boards

resolution.chosen_option: PR gate applies to both Board #4 (Release 1) and Board #5 (Factory & Library)
resolution.rationale: Factory infrastructure files (agents, protocols, library cards) are load-bearing repo artifacts. Bad process files fail silently — no test suite catches wrong protocol steps. PRs provide quality gate and audit trail for all versioned artifacts.

task.description: Library surgery: delete SDT + Need cards, remove backlinks, replace Service Level Progression, delineate Bronze Stack/Operations

decisions.description: Delete Self-Determination Theory + 3 Need cards (invalid types) and remove all backlinks from 13 Strategy/Principle cards
Replace Service Level Progression system card to remove spec content (level names/thresholds) and refocus on state machine mechanism
Delineate Bronze Stack (mechanism: sources, population rules, mode state) from Bronze Operations (workflow: builder actions, mode selection, completion)

triggered_by: SURGERY_PLAN.md — SEVERE audit findings from context library quality audit
